import React, { Component } from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { deleteToddlers } from '../../actions/toddlerActions' class ToddlerFilter extends Component { handleDelete = (toddler) => { this.props.delete(toddler.id) } render() { console.log(this.props.toddler, "Toddler Filter") let toddler = this.props.toddler return (

Name Birthday Emergency Contact Phone Allergy
{toddler.name} {toddler.birthday} {toddler.contact} {toddler.phone} {toddler.allergy}
) } } export default connect(null, { deleteToddlers })(ToddlerFilter)
